mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM Edu_log WHERE RECORD_STATUS= 'Y'
and ( (study_id)>=#{startStudyId} ) or (change_item = '学号' and new_data>=#{startStudyId} ) )
and ( (#{endStudyId}>=study_id) or (change_item = '学号' and #{endStudyId}>=to_number(new_data) ) )
and (grade_number = #{gradeNumber} or (change_item = '年级' and new_data = #{gradeNumber}) )
and (user_name like '%${userName}%' or (change_item = '姓名' and new_data = #{userName}) )
and change_item = #{changeItem}
and change_item not in ('成绩管理')
and change_time>=#{startChangeTime}
and #{endChangeTime}>=change_time
order by change_time Desc

select eu.user_flow,eu.major_id,eu.major_name,eu.period, eu.sid,su.user_head_img,eu.credit,eu.intro, su.user_name,su.sex_id,su.sex_name,su.status_id, su.status_desc,su.user_phone,su.user_email, su.id_no,su.user_birthday,su.title_id,su.title_name, su.degree_id,su.degree_name,su.education_id,su.education_name, su.post_id,su.post_name, so.org_flow,so.org_name from pdsci.edu_user eu,pdsci.sys_user su,pdsci.sys_org so,pdsci.sys_user_role sur where eu.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' and su.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' and so.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' and sur.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' and eu.user_flow = su.user_flow and so.org_flow = su.org_flow and su.user_flow =sur.user_flow
and sur.role_flow=#{roleFlow}
and (su.user_Name like #{condition} or so.org_Name like #{condition} or eu.major_Name like #{condition})
and eu.user_flow in ( select distinct(user_flow) from pdsci.edu_student_course where course_flow=#{courseFlow} )
order by su.org_flow asc,eu.major_id asc
select eu.*, su.* from pdsci.EDU_USER eu, pdsci.SYS_USER su where eu.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' and su.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' and eu.USER_FLOW = su.user_flow and su.USER_FLOW = #{userFlow}

SELECT su.SEX_ID, su.SEX_NAME, su.USER_NAME, su.USER_BIRTHDAY, eu.AWARD_DEGREE_CERT_CODE, eu.AWARD_DEGREE_TIME, eu.TRAIN_TYPE_ID, eu.TRAIN_TYPE_NAME, eu.MAJOR_ID, eu.MAJOR_NAME, eu.PERIOD, eu.GRADUATE_TIME, eu.DIPLOMA_CODE, eu.train_Category_Id, eu.train_Category_name, eu.degree_Level_Id, eu.degree_Level_Name, eu.CONTENT FROM EDU_USER eu, SYS_USER su, RES_DOCTOR rd WHERE eu.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND su.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND eu.USER_FLOW = su.USER_FLOW AND eu.USER_FLOW = rd.DOCTOR_FLOW
AND eu.USER_FLOW = #{userFlow}

SELECT su.USER_NAME,eu.SID FROM EDU_USER eu, SYS_USER su WHERE eu.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND su.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND eu.USER_FLOW = su.USER_FLOW
AND eu.SID = #{sid}
select doctor_flow,doctor_name from oa_tutor_docking where record_status='Y'

select a.user_flow, a.sid, b.user_name, c.xm, c.zjlx, c.zjhm, c.sfzz, c.rxrq, c.xjzt, c.fmxm1, c.fmzjlx1, c.fmzjhm1, c.fmxm2, c.fmzjlx2, c.fmzjhm2 from edu_user a left join sys_user b on a.user_flow = b.user_flow left join gydxj_supplement_info c on a.user_flow = c.user_flow where a.record_status = 'Y' and b.record_status = 'Y' and (a.train_type_id != '5' or a.train_type_id is null) and (a.study_form_id != '5' or a.study_form_id is null)
and a.sid like '%${sid}%'
and b.user_name like '%${userName}%'
and a.train_type_id = #{trainTypeId}
and a.train_category_id = #{trainCategoryId}
and c.submit_flag = 'Y'
and c.submit_flag is null
